Please read the full description.

Give this formula a try. It Might Help.
Now, these days I am taking it every day.
You should drink this daily; days before you get sick and this will keep you from getting sick.
I don't know, if this coronavirus is more powerful than this but, it is better than do nothing.
This will keep you healthy. it is very effective.

This is a very efficient and economical alternative.
This is NOT a medicine that cures coronavirus COVID-19 disease, but it may help not to get it.
I have used it for influenza and other flu conditions, and it worked very well for me.
It has also worked for people whom I have recommended it.
This mixture eliminates the fever caused by infections, removes nasal secretions, and all the symptoms

All viruses incubate in the throat the first days
These two ingredients when combined create a reaction that when coming in to contact with viruses or bacteria in the throat, eliminates them leaving the body clean of any infection.
This mixture if we take it frequently will help us to prevent ourselves from getting sick and will keep us free from all contagion or any other disease.

This alternative will make your body more alkaline and less acidic.
Remember that an alkaline body is not easily attacked by diseases.
The idea of combining baking soda and lime juice draws on the basic principles of acidity and the pH scale.
Scientists use the pH scale to measure the acidity of a solution.
A solution can have a pH level between 0 and 14.
The lower the pH, the more acidic the solution, so:
pH levels below 7 indicate an acidic solution
pH levels above 7 indicate an alkaline, or base solution
Baking soda, also known as sodium bicarbonate, is a base.

This means that when people dissolve baking soda in water, it forms an alkaline solution.
For example, a 0.1 molar solution of baking soda has a pH of around 8.3.
Lime juice contains citric acid and has a pH of around 3.
Adding baking soda to lime juice will raise the pH to produce a more neutral solution.

That’s why I made this Video to Show You How to Cure and Prevent the Flu, The Fever and Body Ache Caused by the Flu and other respiratory problems, perhaps including coronavirus.
https://youtu.be/RInil4G9Bbc

We need
A green lime.
Water.
Half tablespoon of baking soda.
Two glasses.
Lime Juicer
Method of doing it and taking it.
We are going to squeeze the lemon on one glass and put it aside.
In the other glass, we will dissolve half a tablespoon of baking soda in one or two tablespoons of water.
First - We are going to take the baking soda (bicarbonate solution) with water trying for a moment to stop it in the throat before swallowing it.
Second - drink the lime juice immediately after.

This will prevent you from getting sick with the flu, influenza, cough, flu, fever and many respiratory conditions and even the coronavirus COVID-19.
This should be taken before or when you just begin to feel the symptoms, to prevent and not get sick; but in case you have already become ill, take it two to three times a day to attack the disease and eliminate it.
Also try not to eat too much sweet food or sugars, that make your body acid.
“The microbe is nothing, the soil is everything” Claude Bernard

And Here's a video link from a lady who talks about how baking soda saved her entire family.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7k20VFZeLKY

Please do this and share it.
The more people know about this, the more people will stop suffering. I know it can help
Thank you.
God bless you always.
=============================

snippet.textDisplay:
Amazing video. I love all your videos, but this one was particularly great because it is also so current and important, and applies to EVERYONE in the world during this crisis.
So many daft people never seem to get this. They don't see the seriousness of the situation, and think people are overreacting and even call it a hoax - just because they don't know anyone that's sick and because they themselves are young enough to not be in the most critical risk groups. That pond analogy was brilliant, and perfectly sums up that "everything is perfect, until it isn't".
The movie Contagion (2011) also said it brilliantly, something like: "We'd rather wake up tomorrow to news that we overreacted once again, and be humiliated in the media, than waking up realizing we didn't do enough".

snippet.textDisplay: It is interesting that minimum-wage employees are still being asked to work, cleaning and answering calls in call centers. Seniors are lining up outside grocery stores, in the cold and rain. Many people are asked to stay home from work while their jobs are made redundant.  This has not just been about cancelling a parade and public gatherings.  Sooner now than later, many of us will have no job and no future -- even though we could have been making a difference and earning our keep while still flattening the curve.

snippet.textDisplay: I disagree with your assumption that intuitive thinking ignores exponential growth. It understands it perfectly well. What intuitive thinking says is 'drastic action' isn't sensible. Because people aren't sensible. It makes more sense to require people to practice easy, sensible, things that cut off the path to growth on a wider scale. We talk about hands and ignore feet. And pets and kids. This is stupid. And having sick people go to hospital unless really sick is really dumb. If we can treat it at home and and spare our healers, and 1st responders, let's do that. Plan long term. Learn to reuse and make things. That makes sense. That's strategy. Big shows that mean nothing are just that: nothing. Sometimes even worse. Let's actually be sensible for once.

snippet.textDisplay: TRUTH from a MD. COVID19 is a coronavirus (2019 strain, hence the 19). Coronavirus causes and has caused 10-15% of common colds for decades across the world, especially between November and March which is "cold and flu season". Mostly elderly, but some younger people who are immunosuppressed (immune system's don't work well) can get really sick if they are infected with COVID19 because they have a cytokine storm. Cytokines are chemicals that cause fevers, inflammation, fluid in the lungs, etc.. The reason they have a cytokine storm is because their immune system cannot handle the challenge. So, it releases everything in the "arsenal". Most of you that are reading this have healthy immune systems. So, when your immune system gets challenged by COVID19, it responds appropriately causing you to get a mild fever, a cough, feeling tired, maybe a little tightness in your chest, feeling of sand in your throat/ lungs, a little difficulty breathing, and other mild to moderate symptoms. This is the result of mild to moderate cytokine release from your immune system. Much different symptoms than the "storm". What our government should be doing is encouraging people who have cold symptoms to stay away from their grandparents or anyone who is immunosuppressed until their cold passes. I estimate 1-2 million people in the USA alone have COVID19 right now. Please do not think the "virus" is spreading more because the number of people testing positive is increasing. This is simply not true.  10-15% of people right now who have a runny nose, cough, and are feeling worn down will test positive for COVID19. Approximately 10-20 million people RIGHT NOW in the USA have cold symptoms because we are at the end of cold season. Therefore, I estimate that 1-2 million are infected with COVID19 RIGHT NOW. And only a very small, minuscule fraction of them will have to be hospitalized. And even a smaller fraction will need an iCU admission. And even a smaller fraction will die. Last year, it was COVID18 which resulted in a comparable amount of deaths. The year before it was COVID 17, etc.. The last coronavirus that got any attention was COVID-2 which was the coronavirus that supposedly caused SARS in, you guessed it, 2002. Exercise good hand washing habits. Stop hoarding paper towels and toilet paper please. Stay away from elderly people when you are sick. But love them more when you are healthy because they need it, just like you do. Hopefully our legislators (people we elected to make laws) will wake up, open businesses back up, and let us get on with living life without constraints. Do not focus on the number or statistical trends of people who test positive for COVID19.  The ONLY reason there aren't 1-2 million positive test results, right now, is because our government and scientists/ labs were inefficient in getting the tests available and read quickly. Like I said, there are 10-20 million , that's Million with a M, Americans who have a cold right now.  They have tested a small percentage of them.  Nevertheless, there would still be the same amount of deaths (less than 1000), which don't require lab tests.There was no need to shut down businesses over this. Simply avoid being around elderly people when you have a cold! And our hospitals and long term care facilities need to do a better job at isolating and treating elderly patients. Not rocket science here. Spread the word.

Nice graphics EXCEPT. We live in a free society, where huge swaths of " Healthcare capability," are Individuals with hopes & dreams & fears & families & responsibilities. So the " Hopeful-Ignorant
' ( I'm confident there are words for this duality in Chinese & Japanese & perhaps German. ) slang for the call in sick from the early days of ICU nurses calling in sick rather than go to work in the ICU setting with HIV patients on Ventilators was " Mommy-Nurses " They would call in sick, or transfer to " safe " roles such as Labor & Delivery, rather than risk themselves or carrying infection home to family. So, unfortunately adding complexity to the graph, that Health care capacity straight, horizontal bar is Hopeful-Ignorant. It shall decline over time, as cases workload, deaths , & perhaps most importantly HCW's becoming ill, & or Deaths increase. As I Write this 23MAR2020, world press and social media shows 17 Physicians China, & Italy deceased from exposure, & 1 Nurse from Italy. So the decline, " Sigmoid curve of the loss of HCW & healthcare capacity must be considered.

snippet.textDisplay:
What this video doesn't tell you is how long the world would have to be on lockdown to flatten the curve sufficiently. It can easily exceed a practical amount of time, especially when most countries are far, far away from practicing anything close to real containment, meaning new cases will easily keep arising for the rest of the year. Yeah no one is lasting a year under lockdown...

The economic blow from lockdowns will very quickly outweigh the health dangers of the virus so at some point we'll have to let the curve run it's course.

With the exception of countries like S. Korea and Singapore who are actually attempting real containment, other countries are at best buying a bit of time before they are forced to make the decision to let the virus run its course. So even Singapore and S. Korea will eventually have to give in, unless they play on banning Americans and other travelers for the rest of time. Looks like coronavirus is here to stay.
